```{r}
df_names <- read_csv("5Y2016_S0101.csv", n_max = 0) %>% names()
df_names
```
```{r}
perc_pop_15up = read_csv("5Y2016_S0101.csv", col_names = df_names, skip = 6, n_max = 15)
head(perc_pop_15up)
```
```{r}
tgt_county_totals = c("Miami-Dade County, Florida!!Total!!Estimate", "Broward County, Florida!!Total!!Estimate", "Palm Beach County, Florida!!Total!!Estimate", "Monroe County, Florida!!Total!!Estimate")
```
```{r}
tot_pop_tgts = tot_pop_df %>% select(tgt_county_totals)
head(tot_pop_tgts)
```
```{r}
perc_pop_15up_tgts = perc_pop_15up %>% select(tgt_county_totals)
head(perc_pop_15up_tgts)
```
```{r}
for (i in colnames(perc_pop_15up_tgts)){
   # print(perc_pop_15up_tgts[[i]])
  perc_pop_15up_tgts[[i]]<-as.numeric(gsub("\\%","",perc_pop_15up_tgts[[i]]/100))
}
head(perc_pop_15up_tgts)
```
